data.text: Maanɔɠɔi ɠa è ʋɛ, ɗɛi è zɔiti koloɠolosu,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gi maawɔinɠa!
Siɛgi zu tonai kpunɛsu la,
Ti ʋu ta-ɠɔɔzoganiiti ma, eɠɛ koto kpulugiti.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa fai pɛ unda,
Ɗa ɗa-eteai ziɛ gaanɛɛi zu.
Kɔɔɠuluɓaiti ta kpeei loozu taazuʋɛ,
Peleiti suɲakaʋɛ,
Zooi ɠaalɛiɗa eɠɛ saa ɠa loo, su ɗa vɔ,
«Niizu, nà ga wuzeɠe,»
Wa-vaazeikpasuiti ta ga kpakuɓakugi nɔ,
Nuɓusɛiti ta ɠala, ti ɠɛ ga zuʋui,
Wɔiti wo maaɠoozaai, à mɛni nii gè kɛɛni!
Kotoba nuiti ti lua Siyɔn,
Zɔi é ziɛzu telebodai zu,
Naama nui ɠa a zei ada wuzeɠeaiti,
È-ɠaazuʋɛti ta masagi ʋɛtɛ ná-padai zu,
Ɗa ɠisiɛ naazu è maalua vai zu teʋegai,
È la mɔ waso nuɓusɛi tɛiti kaa pɛ,
Kɛlɛ ɗa Siyɔn ʋɛtɛ,
Miná ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-bɔɔlɔlai lɛɛzu ná ga giye.
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ga ada-lukpɔɠaaleʋe nui,
Wa-ɠaluiti ti viega,
Zeluzalɛme nu nɔpɛ ge la ɠɛ ma: «Nà zeeɓɛzu!»
